channel.title: The Droidlocks Initiative Podcast
channel.description: Enjoy the Best of DubStep love weekly feed from Tokyo Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Radio Station.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Orientation - Station 1 - The Droid
channel.itunes:author: Hiromu Okamoto
channel.itunes:summary: Enjoy the Best of DubStep love weekly feed from Tokyo Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Radio Station.

item.title: Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Orientation Podcast - Episode 5
item.description: Welcome to our 5th orientation podcast. This episode deals with the fear of technology. So if you got the fear in you, do not download this episode. It is not for the faint hearted of us. Tracklist: 1. Si Begg - Non Stop Cut And Paste (Jacob London Mix) 2. M2J - Odd Sockz 3. Elemental & 3D - Kaotic 4. Phokus - Mash Up Di Place 5. Mackjiggah - Cheap Trick 6. Phokus - Inta (Wadadda Rmx) 7. Revolt Op - Yout Man (Original Mix) 8. Heyoka - Diesel Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Radio Station Direct Link: http://69.64.61.5:8000/listen.pls
item.dc:creator: Hiromu Okamoto
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Orientation Podcast - Episode 4
item.description: March 2008 fresh new orientation podcast from Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem radio Station. 1. Mike Lennon - When Science Fails (Rusko Remix) 2. Wonder - What (Caspa Remix) 3. Reso & Roguestar - No Such Thing as Fate 4. Moving Ninja - Witchdokta (30hz Remix) 5. Sukh Knight - Born Invincible 6. After Dark - Slaughter Chamber 7. Soul Soldier - The Dying Babylone 8. Aaron Spectre - Say More Fire 9. 2h-2n - Rock Da Frenchy Beat (Soul Soldier Remix) Direct feed: http://69.64.61.5:8000/listen.pls

item.title: Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Orientation Podcast - Episode 3
item.description: Enjoy the 3rd orientation podcast for February 2008. Pure DubStep Love from Station 1 - The Droid. 1. Goth-Trad - Genesis 2. Cotti - The Search 3. Quest - Hardfood 4. Sarantis - Fetish 5. Jack Sparrow - Spam Purse 6. Team Shadetek - Skynet Riddim 7. DZ - Strong on Ya 8. Gravious - Winter Sun Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Radio Direct Feed: http://69.64.61.5:8000/listen.pls

item.title: Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem Orientation Podcast - Episode 2
item.description: DROIDLOCKS INITIATIVE - STATION 1 - THE DROID Enjoy the second podcast for February 2008. Pure DubStep Love. 1. Chimpo - Lock Off 2. Malicious Tactics - Malicious Thoughts 3. Monsta - Ready for This 4. Reso - If Ya Can't Beat Em 5. Point B - Gymede 6. Blackmass Plastics - Pump Maximiser 7. Cluekid - Round 2 8. item.title: Droidlocks DubStep Mayhem - Episode 1
item.description: Enjoy our weekly feed of DubStep love. Episode 1 Playlist: 1. Kromestar - Kalawanji 2. Cardopusher - Collapsible Shelter (Pacheko Remix) 3. Ebola - Painkillers 4. Rusko - 2_n_a_q 5. Dokkebi Q - Black Vomit 6. Rumblejunkie - Dope Angel (Antiserum Remix) 7. Helixir - Narcotik Dub 8. 16 Bit - In the death Car
